folder: Richmond Avenue & Church Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1) Richmond Avenue, west side, at the head of Church Street, showing the Dutch Reformed Church. It stands on the site of the church that burned down during the Revolution. Refers to Post Dutch Ch. on Staten Island. About 1910

By Mulford Simonson
From P.L.Sperr Collection

(2) and (3) Viewing from Church Street. Views 2 and 3 were taken the same day.

P.L.Sperr
1924
